mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.path AS "path", a.version AS "version", a.category_id AS "docCategoryDTO.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.name AS "docCategoryDTO.name"
LEFT JOIN plugin_doc_category b ON b.id = a.category_id
